items.label: post(string path, ballerina/http:Request|string|xml|json|byte[]|ballerina/io:ReadableByteChannel|ballerina/mime:Entity[]? message)(ballerina/http:Response|error)
items.documentation: The `post()` function can be used to send HTTP POST requests to HTTP endpoints.

items.label: head(string path, ballerina/http:Request|string|xml|json|byte[]|ballerina/io:ReadableByteChannel|ballerina/mime:Entity[]? message = ())(ballerina/http:Response|error)
items.documentation: The `head()` function can be used to send HTTP HEAD requests to HTTP endpoints.

items.label: put(string path, ballerina/http:Request|string|xml|json|byte[]|ballerina/io:ReadableByteChannel|ballerina/mime:Entity[]? message)(ballerina/http:Response|error)
items.documentation: The `put()` function can be used to send HTTP PUT requests to HTTP endpoints.

items.label: execute(string httpVerb, string path, ballerina/http:Request|string|xml|json|byte[]|ballerina/io:ReadableByteChannel|ballerina/mime:Entity[]? message)(ballerina/http:Response|error)
items.documentation: Invokes an HTTP call with the specified HTTP verb.

items.label: patch(string path, ballerina/http:Request|string|xml|json|byte[]|ballerina/io:ReadableByteChannel|ballerina/mime:Entity[]? message)(ballerina/http:Response|error)
items.documentation: The `patch()` function can be used to send HTTP PATCH requests to HTTP endpoints.

items.label: delete(string path, ballerina/http:Request|string|xml|json|byte[]|ballerina/io:ReadableByteChannel|ballerina/mime:Entity[]? message)(ballerina/http:Response|error)
items.documentation: The `delete()` function can be used to send HTTP DELETE requests to HTTP endpoints.

items.label: get(string path, ballerina/http:Request|string|xml|json|byte[]|ballerina/io:ReadableByteChannel|ballerina/mime:Entity[]? message = ())(ballerina/http:Response|error)
items.documentation: The `get()` function can be used to send HTTP GET requests to HTTP endpoints.

items.label: options(string path, ballerina/http:Request|string|xml|json|byte[]|ballerina/io:ReadableByteChannel|ballerina/mime:Entity[]? message = ())(ballerina/http:Response|error)
items.documentation: The `options()` function can be used to send HTTP OPTIONS requests to HTTP endpoints.

items.label: forward(string path, http:Request request)(ballerina/http:Response|error)
items.documentation: The `forward()` function can be used to invoke an HTTP call with inbound request's HTTP verb

items.label: submit(string httpVerb, string path, ballerina/http:Request|string|xml|json|byte[]|ballerina/io:ReadableByteChannel|ballerina/mime:Entity[]? message)(ballerina/http:HttpFuture|error)
items.documentation:
Submits an HTTP request to a service with the specified HTTP verb.
The `submit()` function does not give out a `Response` as the result,
rather it returns an `HttpFuture` which can be used to do further interactions with the endpoint.

items.label: getResponse(http:HttpFuture httpFuture)(ballerina/http:Response|error)
items.documentation: This just pass the request to actual network call.

items.label: hasPromise(http:HttpFuture httpFuture)(boolean)
items.documentation: This just pass the request to actual network call.

items.label: getNextPromise(http:HttpFuture httpFuture)(ballerina/http:PushPromise|error)
items.documentation: This just pass the request to actual network call.

items.label: getPromisedResponse(http:PushPromise promise)(ballerina/http:Response|error)
items.documentation: This just pass the request to actual network call.

items.label: rejectPromise(http:PushPromise promise)
items.documentation: This just pass the request to actual network call.
